column1: '''Xander Forterie''' is a Dutch make-up artist and sculptor
column2: who runs the Unreal studio with his business partner Rogier Samuels. They were both employed by [[Weta Workshop]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].

column1: Forterie worked on creature prosthetics in all three films and made several [[Sideshow Collectibles]] statuettes. He also appeared in the [[Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All...|prologue]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' as the Dwarf lord [[Ãšri]].
